title: League won't launch
body:
My league just won't launch. I played yesterday and had no problems. 
But today whenever i click the launch icon nothing happens. i've tried a couple of 'solutions' but know very little of software and etc. so wasn't able to make it work. i'm pretty sure it's not the firewall that is stopping it and launching it as admin is not working either.
I hope someone can help me fix this.

my thanks :)

replies.body:
Have you tried *temporarily* disabling your Firewall to ensure it's not causing problems for League? There are a few other network settings that could prevent your patcher from reaching our patching servers, so I recommend checking our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) out.

Let me know if this caused any change.
